20110120215539.000|20110120215541.000|TR0|HOSTIN:  That is the terrific thing about 
20110120215541.000|20110120215544.000|TR0|this case.  Kidnapping does not have a 
20110120215544.000|20110120215546.000|TR0|statute of limitations.  And that means 
20110120215546.000|20110120215548.000|TR0|that any time someone is kidnapped, you 
20110120215548.000|20110120215551.000|TR0|can bring charges.  And I think the theory 
20110120215551.000|20110120215553.000|TR0|behind that is to sort of discourage 
20110120215553.000|20110120215556.000|TR0|people from kidnapping children and others 
20110120215556.000|20110120215558.000|TR0|in the first place, because if you get 
20110120215558.000|20110120215600.000|TR0|caught, you can be charged with it.
20110120215600.000|20110120215603.000|TR0|
20110120215603.000|20110120215605.000|TR0|BALDWIN:  What happens if she says, "I 
20110120215605.000|20110120215607.000|TR0|don't want to press charges"?
20110120215607.000|20110120215610.000|TR0|
20110120215610.000|20110120215612.000|TR0|HOSTIN:  Well, you know, it's sort of a 
20110120215612.000|20110120215614.000|TR0|misconception.  People think that citizens 
20110120215614.000|20110120215617.000|TR0|that press charges, but it's the 
20110120215617.000|20110120215619.000|TR0|government that presses charges.  And 
20110120215619.000|20110120215621.000|TR0|although it would be very difficult to 
20110120215621.000|20110120215624.000|TR0|prove this case without her, the 
20110120215624.000|20110120215626.000|TR0|government can still proceed on this case.
20110120215626.000|20110120215628.000|TR0|

20110120215631.000|20110120215633.000|TR0|has just been awarded $400,000 because of 
20110120215633.000|20110120215636.000|TR0|this character assassination campaign

20110120215638.000|20110120215640.000|TR0|woman he barely knew posted this terrible 
20110120215640.000|20110120215643.000|TR0|posting, accusations online under a

20110120215704.000|20110120215706.000|TR0|HOSTIN:  Well, they found this woman by 
20110120215706.000|20110120215708.000|TR0|tracking her computer and identifying her 
20110120215708.000|20110120215711.000|TR0|by her unique IP address.  These people 
20110120215711.000|20110120215713.000|TR0|think, Brooke, that they can sit in their
